data.message: It's unlikely for someone to recognize and speak about this pattern in my situation... because I am older it allowed me to see the situation from a different perspective and also a business and operations perspective and it's just garbage and the people who run it are garbage and the way they treat people like garbage. They psychologically abuse those people who were already abused which is why they target me they know I am alone and have emotional reactiveness when threatened because I was an abused child.
